items.sentence: Tom said that playing video games isn't a waste of time.

Let's hope that we can avoid this problem in the future.
I hope that we don't run into any bureaucratic red tape.
Things were different here back when I first moved here.
It's been three years since the last time I drove a car.
If you're not here within five minutes, the deal is off.
Don't worry. Didn't I say that everything would go well?
Learning another language means discovering a new world.
Could you do me a favor and wait until tomorrow morning?
Have you been crying all night? Your eyes are all puffy.
All of the books are good, but none as good as this one.
Don't pretend that you're sorry. I know that you're not.
Tom stood there for a long time without saying anything.

I get nervous when I speak in front of a large audience.
